algorithm_technique: Frequency map and two-pointer approach after sorting
problem_summary_simple: Pair players into teams with equal total skill and sum their chemistry (product of skills).
problem_summary_technical: Use a frequency map to count player skills, then find pairs summing to a target, calculating chemistry.
key_insights: The total skill of all players must be divisible by the number of teams (N/2).
The target sum for each team is `sum(skill) / (N/2)`.
A frequency map (Counter) efficiently stores player skill counts.
